English.title: ğŸŒ± Welcome to the Theory of Change Interactive App
English.intro: This app is your interactive guide to understand and apply the components of a Theory of Change (ToC). It includes tools to help you explore, reflect, learn, and take action.
English.intro_text_2: Use the sidebar to navigate between tools: explore the components of a Theory of Change, receive tailored recommendations, envision systemic change, or evaluate the completeness of your initiativeâ€™s ToC.
English.intro_home: ğŸ“– Read the definition of Theory of Change below. The process of building a Theory of Change involves a clear sequence of stages, each with its own components. Please explore each of them carefully â€” they are essential to design a strong and complete ToC for your initiative. Enjoy the process!
English.diagnostic_title: ğŸ“‹ Theory of Change Diagnostic Tool
English.diagnostic_intro_main: This diagnostic tool helps you reflect on the completeness of your organization's Theory of Change (ToC). It takes about **5 minutes** to complete. After submission, you can download your results and receive feedback for each component.
English.diagnostic_intro_ref: This tool helps organizations, project teams, and facilitators quickly identify strengths and gaps in their ToC logic, so they can prioritize improvements and strengthen their planning and learning. All your responses remain local and private.
English.initiative_name: ğŸ”– Name of the initiative you're assessing (for display only)
English.show_summary_only: ğŸ” Show only the summary (hide detailed feedback)
English.download_results: ğŸ“¥ Download full results as Excel
English.thanks: âœ… Thank you for completing the diagnostic! Download your results below and review the feedback to improve your Theory of Change.
English.visual_map: ### ğŸ—‚ï¸ Visual Map of All Components
English.final_disclaimer: ğŸ *This report is for reflection and internal use. You can download your responses above. No data is stored.*
English.use_as_reference: Use this component as a reference for your **{criterion}** work.
English.select_component: ğŸ” (Optional) Select a key part (component) of the Theory of Change to explore or review. If none is selected, all will be shown below by stage.
English.glossary_intro: Key terms used throughout this tool.
English.select_glossary_term: ğŸ” Search or select a term

Swahili.title: ğŸŒ± Karibu kwenye Programu ya Mabadiliko ya Nadharia
Swahili.intro: Programu hii ni mwongozo wako wa kushiriki ili kuelewa na kutumia vipengele vya Nadharia ya Mabadiliko (ToC). Inajumuisha zana za kuchunguza, kutafakari, kujifunza na kuchukua hatua.
Swahili.intro_text_2: Tumia menyu ya kando kuvinjari kati ya zana: chunguza vipengele vya ToC, pokea mapendekezo, fikiri kuhusu mabadiliko ya kimfumo au tathmini ukamilifu wa ToC ya mpango wako.
Swahili.intro_home: ğŸ“– Soma tafsiri ya nadharia ya mabadiliko hapa chini. Mchakato wa kujenga Nadharia ya Mabadiliko unafuata hatua kadhaa zenye mpangilio, kila hatua ikiwa na vipengele vyake. Tafadhali pitia kila kipengele kwa makini â€” ni muhimu kwa kuunda ToC thabiti na kamili kwa mradi wako. Furahia mchakato huu!
Swahili.diagnostic_title: ğŸ“‹ Zana ya Uchunguzi ya Nadharia ya Mabadiliko
Swahili.search_bar: ğŸ” Tafuta vipengele au maneno muhimu
Swahili.diagnostic_intro_main: Zana hii ya uchunguzi inakusaidia kutafakari ukamilifu wa Nadharia ya Mabadiliko (ToC) ya shirika lako. Inachukua kama **dakika 5** kukamilisha. Baada ya kutuma, unaweza kupakua matokeo na kupata mrejesho kwa kila kipengele.
Swahili.diagnostic_intro_ref: Zana hii inasaidia mashirika, timu na wawezeshaji kutambua kwa haraka nguvu na mapungufu katika mantiki yao ya ToC ili kuweka vipaumbele vya maboresho na kuimarisha upangaji na ujifunzaji. Majibu yako yote hubaki hapa hapa.
Swahili.initiative_name: ğŸ”– Jina la mpango unaopimwa (kwa ajili ya onyesho pekee)
Swahili.show_summary_only: ğŸ” Onyesha muhtasari pekee (ficha maelezo zaidi)
Swahili.download_results: ğŸ“¥ Pakua matokeo yote kama Excel
Swahili.thanks: âœ… Asante kwa kukamilisha uchunguzi! Pakua matokeo yako hapa chini na pitia mrejesho ili kuboresha Nadharia yako ya Mabadiliko.
Swahili.final_disclaimer: ğŸ *Ripoti hii ni kwa ajili ya kutafakari na matumizi ya ndani pekee. Unaweza kupakua majibu yako hapo juu. Hakuna data itakayohifadhiwa.*
Swahili.use_as_reference: Tumia kipengele hiki kama rejeleo kwa kazi yako ya **{criterion}**.
Swahili.select_component: ğŸ” (Hiari) Chagua sehemu kuu (kipengele) ya Nadharia ya Mabadiliko ya kuchunguza au kutathmini. Usipochagua, zote zitaonyeshwa hapa chini kwa hatua.
Swahili.glossary_intro: Maneno muhimu yanayotumika kwenye zana hii.
